verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> in<WG1909> the<WG3588> right hand<WG1188> of him that sat<WG2521> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> a book<WG975> written<WG1125> within<WG2081> and<WG2532> on the backside,<WG3693> sealed<WG2696> with seven<WG2033> seals.<WG4973>

And <WG2532> I saw<WG1492> a strong<WG2478> angel<WG32> proclaiming<WG2784> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> Who<WG5101> is<WG2076> worthy<WG514> to open<WG455> the<WG3588> book,<WG975> and<WG2532> to loose<WG3089> the<WG3588> seals<WG4973> thereof?<WG848>

And <WG2532> no man<WG3762> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> nor<WG3761> in<WG1909> earth,<WG1093> neither<WG3761> under<WG5270> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> was able<WG1410> to open<WG455> the<WG3588> book,<WG975> neither<WG3761> to look<WG991> thereon.<WG846>

And <WG2532> I<WG1473> wept<WG2799> much,<WG4183> because<WG3754> no man<WG3762> was found<WG2147> worthy<WG514> to open<WG455> and<WG2532> to read<WG314> the<WG3588> book,<WG975> neither<WG3777> to look<WG991> thereon.<WG846>

And <WG2532> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> elders<WG4245> saith<WG3004> unto me,<WG3427> Weep<WG2799> not:<WG3361> behold,<WG2400> the<WG3588> Lion<WG3023> <WG5607> of<WG1537> the<WG3588> tribe<WG5443> of Judah,<WG2455> the<WG3588> Root<WG4491> of David,<WG1138> hath prevailed<WG3528> to open<WG455> the<WG3588> book,<WG975> and<WG2532> to loose<WG3089> the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> seals<WG4973> thereof.<WG848>

And <WG2532> I beheld,<WG1492> and,<WG2532> lo,<WG2400> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> and<WG2532> of the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts,<WG2226> and<WG2532> in<WG1722> the midst<WG3319> of the<WG3588> elders,<WG4245> stood<WG2476> a Lamb<WG721> as<WG5613> it had been slain,<WG4969> having<WG2192> seven<WG2033> horns<WG2768> and<WG2532> seven<WG2033> eyes,<WG3788> which<WG3739> are<WG1526> the<WG3588> seven<WG2033> Spirits<WG4151> of God<WG2316> sent forth<WG649> into<WG1519> all<WG3956> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>
And <WG2532> he came<WG2064> and<WG2532> took<WG2983> the<WG3588> book<WG975> out of<WG1537> the<WG3588> right hand<WG1188> of him that sat<WG2521> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> throne.<WG2362>

And <WG2532> when<WG3753> he had taken<WG2983> the<WG3588> book,<WG975> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts<WG2226> and<WG2532> four and twenty<WG1501> <WG5064> elders<WG4245> fell down<WG4098> before<WG1799> the<WG3588> Lamb,<WG721> having<WG2192> every one of them<WG1538> harps,<WG2788> and<WG2532> golden<WG5552> vials<WG5357> full<WG1073> of odors,<WG2368> which<WG3739> are<WG1526> the<WG3588> prayers<WG4335> of saints.<WG40>

And <WG2532> they sung<WG103> a new<WG2537> song,<WG5603> saying,<WG3004> Thou art<WG1488> worthy<WG514> to take<WG2983> the<WG3588> book,<WG975> and<WG2532> to open<WG455> the<WG3588> seals<WG4973> thereof:<WG848> for<WG3754> thou wast slain,<WG4969> and<WG2532> hast redeemed<WG59> us<WG2248> to God<WG2316> by<WG1722> thy<WG4675> blood<WG129> out of<WG1537> every<WG3956> kindred,<WG5443> and<WG2532> tongue,<WG1100> and<WG2532> people,<WG2992> and<WG2532> nation;<WG1484>
And <WG2532> hast made<WG4160> us<WG2248> unto our<WG2257> God<WG2316> kings<WG935> and<WG2532> priests:<WG2409> and<WG2532> we shall reign<WG936> on<WG1909> the<WG3588> earth.<WG1093>

And <WG2532> I beheld,<WG1492> and<WG2532> I heard<WG191> the voice<WG5456> of many<WG4183> angels<WG32> round about<WG2943> the<WG3588> throne<WG2362> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> beasts<WG2226> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> elders:<WG4245> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> number<WG706> of them<WG846> was<WG2258> ten thousand times ten thousand,<WG3461> <WG3461> and<WG2532> thousands of thousands;<WG5505> <WG5505>

Saying <WG3004> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> Worthy<WG514> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> Lamb<WG721> that was slain<WG4969> to receive<WG2983> power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> riches,<WG4149> and<WG2532> wisdom,<WG4678> and<WG2532> strength,<WG2479> and<WG2532> honor,<WG5092> and<WG2532> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> blessing.<WG2129>

And <WG2532> every<WG3956> creature<WG2938> which<WG3739> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> and<WG2532> on<WG1722> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> under<WG5270> the<WG3588> earth,<WG1093> and<WG2532> such as<WG3739> are<WG2076> in<WG1909> the<WG3588> sea,<WG2281> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> that<WG3588> are in<WG1722> them,<WG846> heard<WG191> I saying,<WG3004> Blessing,<WG2129> and<WG2532> honor,<WG5092> and<WG2532> glory,<WG1391> and<WG2532> power,<WG2904> be unto him that sitteth<WG2521> upon<WG1909> the<WG3588> throne,<WG2362> and<WG2532> unto the<WG3588> Lamb<WG721> forever and ever.<WG1519> <WG165> <WG165>

And <WG2532> the<WG3588> four<WG5064> beasts<WG2226> said,<WG3004> Amen.<WG281> And<WG2532> the<WG3588> four and twenty<WG1501> <WG5064> elders<WG4245> fell down<WG4098> and<WG2532> worshipped<WG4352> him that liveth<WG2198> forever and ever.<WG1519> <WG165> <WG165>
